title: Research Survey for Indian Folk Art x Animation
selftext:
Hello everyone! I am conducting a short research survey based on the effective use of Indian Folk Art x Animation as representation of concerns and / or identity of marginalized communities in India. Please do help me out by filling up this survey. The survey is open for all.

It is a bit extensive because you will have to watch two short films as part of this survey, but it might also increase your awareness on some beautiful applications on the said theme. You can find the form here -

[https://forms.gle/88DozzWCWtLuuXkt8](https://forms.gle/88DozzWCWtLuuXkt8)

Thank you for your consideration :)
